Title: Relates to college admission and financial aid for students who have received a high school diploma from certain online high school programs
Summary: Provides that students who receive a high school diploma from an online high school program located within the United States that is accredited in accordance with the Job Corps Policy and Requirements Handbook shall be eligible for admission to colleges and financial aid.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to college admission and financial aid for students who have received a high school diploma from certain online high school programs
